content: Which American pop artist is known for his iconic depictions of Campbell's soup cans?

That would be Andy Warhol, one of the leading figures in the Pop Art movement. His silkscreen paintings of Campbell's Soup Cans, created in 1962, are some of the most recognizable works of art in the world. Warhol's use of everyday consumer products as subjects was a way to comment on American culture and consumerism.
